trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Carmichael
There were no other sightings in Carmichael on or around June 22nd 2013
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Three redorange balls of light heading north across sky then hovered, then went NE.
divs: Sighting DetailsI went out on my apartment balcony about 9:30 to have a cigarette.I looked up because I heard a helicopter,then I heard two planes,then I saw two glowing balls of light floating across the sky from south to north,they slowed downdown,then went northeast. I went in and got my boyfriend. He saw them too. Two people were walking and I said look.we went inside. After about 5 min I went back out to take our trash and saw another one. I got my guy. I knocked on neighbors door, they saw it too. We and them caught it on our camcorders. It was exciting. We wanted and waited to see more
